oracle.mapviewer.share.style
Class AbstractStyleModel

java.lang.Object
  oracle.mapviewer.share.style.AbstractStyleModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, StyleModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractBucketStyleModel, AreaStyleModel, BarChartStyleModel, CollectionStyleModel, ColorStyleModel, DotDensityStyleModel, HeatMapStyleModel, LineStyleModel, MarkerStyleModel, PieChartStyleModel, TextStyleModel
public abstract class AbstractStyleModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements StyleModel

This class defines an abstract class to represent MapViewer style models.

See Also:
